item.title: Feb 2024 BTO - Tanglin Halt Courtyard - Units With Least Afternoon Sun
item.description: As Singapore grapples with its hottest months on record, the importance of choosing a home wisely becomes more apparent than ever. With temperatures soaring and the sun beating down relentlessly, the last thing you want is to be trapped in a house that feels like an oven. This is more important than ever with the temperatures projected to rise in Singapore. The afternoon sun can turn homes that directly faces the afternoon sun into radiators, releasing stored heat long after sunset.
